content.content: I'm a designer/developer based in Toronto, currently combining my interests in design and code as a web designer at Later with a particular focus on accessibility.

I thrive on creative challenges and creating beautiful interfaces for all. My experience spans the gamut from participating in discovery activities to creating wireframes and high-fidelity mockups to participating and/or leading front and back-end development. Similarly, my services include:

I thrive on creative challenges and creating beautiful interfaces for all. My experience spans the gamut from participating in discovery activities to creating wireframes and high-fidelity mockups to participating and/or leading front and back-end development. Similarly, my services include:
"Inclusive design doesn't mean you're designing one thing for all people. You're designing a diversity of ways to participate so that everyone has a sense of belonging."
I'm always open to working on interesting and innovative projects. Let's collaborate!
